data.title: The Sanctuary at Withers Preserve
data.meta_description: The Market Common area features several playgrounds, beautiful lakes, and sidewalks where you can walk off that delicious lunch or ride your bike to increase your cardio levels.  Just minutes from the beach and the airport, The Sanctuary at Withers Preserve also furnishes great amenities that add value to your investment and quality to your lifestyle.
data.text:
One of the most unique communities in the Myrtle Beach area is the urban village of Market Common which was developed on what was once the Myrtle Beach Air Force Base. The convenience, the village setting, and the pedestrian walkways add a touch of charm to any home that you purchase here. This community features several playgrounds, beautiful lakes, and sidewalks where you can walk off that delicious lunch or ride your bike to increase your cardio levels. Just minutes from the beach and the airport, The Sanctuary at Withers Preserve also furnishes great amenities that add value to your investment and quality to your lifestyle.

You’ll be able to choose from four floor plans that have two bedroom presentations with two full bathrooms for the convenience of your family. Twenty two of the homes are located adjacent to the water which will give you an outstanding view and the perfect location to watch wildlife go about their daily routines. Home prices range from $236,990 to $378,940 and feature from 1,656 to 3,000 square feet of personal living space. These one story homes are energy efficient and provide you with tasteful appointments that add a touch of luxury to your residence. With 9 foot smooth ceilings, upscale cabinetry, and granite countertops, your new home will be the perfect place to host family events and celebrate milestones with friends.

Your new home at The Sanctuary at Withers Preserve is convenient to all types of cuisine that you could ever want; the shopping opportunities are endless along the Grand Strand and the major activities and attractions of Myrtle Beach are just minutes away. With Market Common just steps from your home, you can frequent unique shops, great restaurants, or take in a movie with the family. Your children will love the award-winning schools, you’ll enjoy all of the opportunities for exploration and adventure that await you and your family, and together you can all participate in the local festivals and celebrations throughout the year.

With over 120 golf courses within a short drive of your home, theatres and great restaurants nearby, and great entertainment venues just outside your doorstep, life in Withers Preserve will be exciting and enjoyable each and every day. You’ll enjoy the nature walks, the biking trails, and the pace of life in this slice of paradise here in the Low Country.
